title: AITA: Is He An A*Hole For Hiding Something Of His Neighbors Because It Was Scaring His Son?
description:
Every week we dive DEEP into the AITA (Am I The A*hole) thread on Reddit, and it’s FASCINATING.
It’s a bunch of real-life scenarios people are in where they could EASILY be the a*hole, but maybe – just maybe – once you hear all the details, you’ll understand it a little better and they won’t be SO much of an a*hole! Or maybe not.
Up today: His son is terrified of their neighbor's gnome garden. Because of this, he asked if his neighbor could move the placement of their gnome. When they didn't, he decided to move the gnome himself. Does this make him an a*hole? 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
